      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction de la couleur à travers un prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Colour refraction through a prism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Brechung durch ein Prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction da cor através de um prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione di colore attraverso un prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση χρώματος μέσω ενός πρίσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción del color a través de un prisma</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre comment la lumière blanche est réfractée par un prisme créant un spectre. La lumière violette a été plus réfractée que la lumière rouge.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how white light is refracted through a prism creating a spectrum. The violet light has been refracted more than the red light.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">direction</string>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière rouge</string>
            <string language="en">red light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière violette</string>
            <string language="en">violet light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie weißes Licht durch 
ein Prisma refracted, das ein Spektrum erstellt. Dem violetten 
Licht refracted mehr als das rote Licht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como a luz branca refracted 
através de um prisma que cría um spectrum. A luz violeta 
refracted mais do que a luz vermelha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come la luce bianca 
refracted attraverso un prisma che crea uno spettro. La luce 
viola refracted più della luce rossa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς το άσπρο φως 
διαθλιέται μέσω ενός πρίσματος δημιουργώντας ένα φάσμα. 
Το ιώδες φως έχει διαθλαστεί περισσότερο από το κόκκινο 
φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo la luz blanca se 
refracta a través de un prisma que crea un espectro. La luz 
violeta se ha refractado más que la luz roja.</string>
          </description>
